Reviews.Title: good product

Reviews.Content: i liked this product, was very use full just like new and enjoyed using it  but needs to be updated

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Dayjon Gabbidon
Reviews.Content: I Pick this rating because I enjoy the works of windows itself. Woud recommend the phone to those who also enjoy the works of windows

Reviews.Title: loving this phone
Reviews.Author: spawned1
Reviews.Content: i got this phone today and it was bran new in the box works great everything in the box was new the phone runs great fast internet youtube is outstanding i love this phone even more then when i 1st got my htc hd2

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: sonia Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: It came broken or idk but I made I call nd I couldn't hear the other person and they couldn't hear me

Reviews.Title: HTC HD7 Smartphone
Reviews.Author: BRIAN J. SHAUGHNESSY
Reviews.Content: I got the phone in the mail brand new in perfect condition. Phone works great. I do recommend this phone especially for the price, but I do like the Samsung Galaxy S III better.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: xxxxxxxxxx
Reviews.Content: i just bought a  used htc hd7 from them and it works great!!!!!!! the camera takes beautiful pictures and i jus t love it man , and i got it for less money than other sellers have it for , keep up the good job guys!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Tony Cho
Reviews.Content: Had this phone before. Just bought another. Can't wait. Very fast and smooth. Android user going back to Windows. One of the best phone I've ever used.
